attributes.additional_details: Paddle Steamer Waverley gives pleasure to many Thousands of Scottish and International Visitors every year around the Uk Coastline. The Charity that runs the ship "Waverley Steam Navigation " has had its funds severely depleated due to 3 failed summer seasons and a 60% rise in fuel costs. 2011 could be the ships last season and the government must realise the importance of keeping PS Waverley in an operating status. Please add to my Petition
